parameter.name: subcarrier-frequency
parameter.SemanticDefinition: This parameter reports the configured subcarrier frequency in 1/1000 Hz. As per CCSDS 401.0-B-21, only 8 kHz or 16 kHz are permissible. The fine resolution is specified here as to enable fine tuning of the subcarrier frequency in cases where this is necessary to compensate the forward link Doppler shift. In case that direct modulation is used, this parameter will report '0'. Note: The specified range is intended to also cover the case of non-CCSDS missions.

parameter.name: subcarrier-modulation
parameter.SemanticDefinition: This enumerated parameter reports if the subcarrier is currently being modulated and can take on two values: - 'ON' – the subcarrier is currently being modulated; - 'OFF' – the subcarrier is currently not being modulated. In case no subcarrier is used, this parameter shall be flagged as undefined.

parameter.name: subcarrier-frequency-to-data-clock-coherency
parameter.SemanticDefinition: This enumerated parameter reports if the coherency between the subcarrier frequency and data clock is given in case a subcarrier is used. This parameter can take on 2 values: - 'YES' – the subcarrier frequency is coherent with data clock; - 'NO' – the subcarrier frequency is not coherent with data clock. In case no subcarrier is used, this parameter shall be flagged as undefined.
